sources.full: Tales of the Valiant: Monster Vault 1

trait.name: Aberrant Resilience
entries: The aboleth is resistant to the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, and {@condition stunned} conditions, and it has advantage on saves against spells or effects that would alter its form.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the aboleth fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

trait.name: Slime Pox
entries: Characterized by the slimy pustules that erupt across the victim's body, slime pox is a disease that infects creatures attacked by an aboleth or that come into contact with an aboleth's slime. Until the disease is cured, the infected creature can breathe air and water, can't regain HP except when underwater, and takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage for every 1 hour it remains outside of water or without moisture applied to its skin. Every 24 hours that elapse, the infected creature must make a {@dc 16} CHA save. Each time a creature fails this save, it views the infecting aboleth more and more favorably, becoming the aboleth's doting and protective thrall after three failed saves. The successes and failures don't need to be consecutive, but once a creature has acquired three of a kind, it no longer has to make this save, resulting in either the creature becoming a thrall of the aboleth or an autonomous—though infected—creature. Slime pox can be cured only by the {@spell heal} spell or similar magic.

trait.name: Slimy Skin
entries: The aboleth is coated in an otherworldly mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} CON save or be infected with slime pox (see the Slime Pox trait).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes three Tentacle or Psychic Bolt attacks. If two Tentacle attacks hit one target, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} CON save or contract the slime pox disease (see the Slime Pox trait).

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Psychic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Torrent {@recharge 5}
entries: The aboleth floods the minds of up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it with random and horrific memories from its eons-long life. Each target must make a {@dc 16} WIS save. On a failure, a creature takes 49 ({@damage 14d6}) psychic damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn, as its mind reels from the torrent of images, thoughts, and memories. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The aboleth automatically detects every creature and trap within 60 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

legendary.name: Swim
entries: The aboleth swims up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Slime Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature infected with slime pox within 30 feet of the aboleth takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage, and the aboleth regains HP equal to the damage the creature takes.

monster.name: Animated Armor
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the armor must succeed on a CON save against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Construct Nature
entries: The armor doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Construct Resilience
entries: The armor is immune to poison and psychic damage, and it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition poisoned} conditions.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The animated armor makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Helmet Bash (19 HP or Fewer)
entries: The animated armor slams its helmet into a creature it can sense within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} STR save or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Angelic Resilience
entries: The deva is resistant to radiant damage and to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. In addition, it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

trait.name: Angelic Senses
entries: The deva can pinpoint the location of Aberrations, Celestials, Fiends, and Undead within 30 feet of it and knows if a place or object it can sense is consecrated or desecrated.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The deva's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 4d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Immortal Nature
entries: The deva doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The deva has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reviving Prayer
entries: The deva spends 10 minutes praying to its deity for the safe return of the soul of a slain creature. At the end of the prayer, the deva touches a creature that has been dead no more than 24 hours and returns the creature to life with a number of HP equal to half its HP maximum. Reviving Prayer can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts. A creature restored to life in this way can't be returned to life by this deva again for 30 days.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deva makes three Mace attacks.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) HP and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Change Shape
entries: The deva magically transforms into a Large or smaller Beast or Humanoid that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form, which is Celestial. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying transforms with it or is borne by the new form (the deva's choice). It reverts to its true form if it dies. In a new form, the deva retains its Angelic Resilience, Angelic Senses, and Immortal Nature traits and its HP, HD, ability to speak, proficiencies, and INT, WIS, and CHA scores, as well as this bonus action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The planetar casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using CHA as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}).

trait.name: Angelic Resilience
entries: The planetar is resistant to radiant damage and to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. In addition, it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

trait.name: Angelic Senses
entries: The planetar can pinpoint the location of Aberrations, Celestials, Fiends, and Undead within 30 feet of it and knows if a place or object it can sense is consecrated or desecrated.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 7d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Protection
entries: Aberrations, Celestials, Fiends, and Undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against the planetar.

trait.name: Immortal Nature
entries: The planetar doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The planetar has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The planetar makes two Greatsword attacks, or it makes three Radiant Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting. If two Greatsword or Radiant Bolt attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} CON save or be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) slashing damage plus 31 ({@damage 7d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Burst {@recharge}
entries: A pulse of divine power ripples out from the planetar's golden halo. Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the planetar must make a {@dc 19} DEX save, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Each friendly creature within 15 feet of the planetar is empowered with divine energy and has advantage on all melee attack rolls it makes before the start of the planetar's next turn.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
entries: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 ({@dice 6d8 + 3}) HP and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The ankheg is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can't Bite another target.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} DEX save, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Save for Later
entries: The ankheg quickly digs a small hole and stuffs one creature {@condition grappled} by it into the hole, burying the creature and ending the grapple. A buried creature is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe or stand up. A creature, including the buried creature, can take its action to free the buried creature by succeeding on a {@dc 13} STR check.

monster.name: Flying Sword
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the sword must succeed on a CON save against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Construct Nature
entries: The sword doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Construct Resilience
entries: The sword is immune to poison and psychic damage, and it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition poisoned} conditions.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Whirling Blade (6 HP or Fewer)
entries: The flying sword makes a Slash attack against a target it can sense within 5 feet of it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The solar casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using WIS as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 22}). At will: command, invisibility (self only); 3/day each: greater restoration, resurrection (as an action); 1/day: holy aura.

trait.name: Angelic Resilience
entries: The solar is resistant to radiant damage and to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. In addition, it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions.

trait.name: Angelic Senses
entries: The solar can pinpoint the location of Aberrations, Celestials, Fiends, and Undead within 30 feet of it and knows if a place or object it can sense is consecrated or desecrated.

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@damage 6d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Divine Protection
entries: Aberrations, Celestials, Fiends, and Undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against the solar.

trait.name: Immortal Nature
entries: The solar doesn't require food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the solar fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The solar has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The solar makes three Greatsword or Holy Fire Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting. If two Greatsword or Holy Fire Bolt attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 22} CON save or be {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Holy Fire Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 14} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 6d8 + 7}) radiant damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
entries: The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) HP and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

bonus.name: Celestial Tactics
entries:
The solar uses one of the following tactics:
• Empower Strikes. The solar sends divine power into the weapons of up to two friendly creatures in its sight within 30 feet of it. Each target has advantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes before the start of the solar's next turn. If that attack hits, the weapon deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.
• Inspire Resolve. The creature the solar can see within 30 feet of it gains 14 ({@dice 4d6}) temporary HP and becomes immune to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} conditions until the start of the solar's next turn.
• Manipulate Battlefield. The solar commands up to three friendly creatures it can see to reposition themselves on the battlefield. Each target can use a reaction to move up to half its speed in a direction of the solar's choice. This movement is unaffected by difficult terrain and doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The solar emits divine energy. Each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 22} DEX save, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Intimidating Glare (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The solar glares at up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 22} CHA save or be cowered until the end of its next turn. While cowered, a creature's speed is halved, and it can't look at the solar.

monster.name: Balara
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The balara doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Undead Resilience
entries: The balara is immune to poison damage, to {@condition exhaustion}, and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Terrifying Luminance
entries: When a creature that can see the balara's glowing ribcage starts its turn within 30 feet of the balara, it must make a {@dc 14} WIS save if the balara isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. On a failure, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened}, the creature's speed is reduced to 0, and it can't use reactions. Unless {@status surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the balara until the start of its next turn. If it looks at the balara in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balara makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, or it makes three Necrotic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain HP until the start of the balara's next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain HP until the start of the balara's next turn.

reaction.name: Relentless Pursuit
entries: When a creature the balara can see moves away from it, the balara can move up to half its speed toward that creature. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two Warhammer attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Blazing Bulwark
entries: The azer creates fire in a 15-foot line that is 1 foot wide, originating from a point it can see within 15 feet. This opaque wall is 3 feet tall and provides half-cover to creatures behind it. A creature that moves through the line takes damage as if it touched the azer. The line of fire lasts for 1 minute or until the azer uses this bonus action again.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The basilisk is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the basilisk's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk, it must make a {@dc 12} CON save if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. On a failure, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the save at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until freed by greater restoration or similar magic. Unless {@status surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the basilisk sees itself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and is affected by its own gaze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The basilisk makes two Bite or Poison Spit attacks. If both attacks hit one creature, the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Poison Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) poison damage.

monster.name: Blink Dog
languages: understands Sylvan but can't speak it

trait.name: Fey Resilience
entries: The blink dog is resistant to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition unconscious} conditions.

trait.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
entries: The blink dog's {@skill Perception} is 18 while perceiving by hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The blink dog has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the dog's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The blink dog teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one Bite attack.

monster.name: Black Pudding
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative-1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to-5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through a panel of nonmagical wood or metal in its space up to 2 inches thick in 1 round.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
entries: The pudding doesn't require sleep.

trait.name: Ooze Resilience
entries: The pudding is resistant to the {@condition restrained} condition, and it is immune to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, and {@condition prone} conditions.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The black pudding makes two Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative-1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

bonus.name: Dampen Light
entries: The black pudding dims the light around it. The radius of each light source within 60 feet of it is halved until the start of its next turn. The pudding can't use this action while in sunlight.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 HP. Each new pudding has HP equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the behir is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of HP equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The behir is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes one Bite attack and one Constrict attack. It can replace its Bite attack with a use of Swallow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller and the behir isn't already grappling a creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the behir can't Constrict another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one Bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of the behir's turns. If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} CON save at the end of that turn or regurgitate it, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} and can escape by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 16} DEX save, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The bulette is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bulette makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap {@recharge 5}
entries: The bulette leaps up to 30 feet, diving onto a point it can see or sense within that range and landing on its feet with a thunderous crash. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} STR save, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failure, or half as much damage and not {@condition prone} on a success. Any creature in the bulette's space is then pushed into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it, falling {@condition prone} if none is available.

bonus.name: Seek Prey
entries: The bulette sniffs around for new prey, releasing a guttural chirp when it settles on one. One creature the bulette can see within 30 ft. must make a {@dc 15} WIS save or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn, and the bulette has advantage on its next attack roll against it before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Bickering Heads
entries: The chimera is perpetually one step away from arguing with itself. A creature can use a bonus action on its turn to appeal to one of the heads with bribes (dragon), praise (lion), or displays of magic (goat), forcing a {@dc 15} WIS save or the chimera succumbs to that desire with consequences.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The chimera is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The chimera has three heads and is resistant to the {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and {@condition unconscious} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes one Bite attack, one Headbutt attack, and two Claws attacks, or it can make two Claws attacks and use Fire Breath if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Headbutt
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} DEX save, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The centaur is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the centaur moves at least 30 ft straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Pike attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} STR save or be knocked {@condition prone}. If {@condition prone}, the centaur can make a Hooves attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes one Hooves attack and one Pike attack, or it makes three Longbow attacks.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Defensive Kick
entries: When a creature the centaur can see within 5 feet of it hits it with an attack, it can kick the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 14} STR save or be knocked {@condition prone} or pushed up to 5 feet away (centaur's choice).

trait.name: Acidic Weapons
entries: The trillipol's weapon deals an extra {@damage 5d8} acid damage.

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
entries: Each friendly chol within 10 ft. has advantage on attack rolls and saves.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The trillipol has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trillipol makes three Slam attacks, or it makes four Acid Bolt attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Burst {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 20 ft. must make a {@dc 19} DEX save, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) acid damage on a fail, or half on a success. If failed by 5 or more, it takes an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage at the start of its next turn.

bonus.name: Shape Chol
entries: Manipulates up to three friendly chol within 60 ft., granting one:

items: Elastic Limbs-+10 ft. speed, ignores opportunity attacks.
Frightful Mien-non-chol within 5 ft. must make {@dc 19} WIS save or be {@condition frightened} until trillipol's next turn.
Sticky Acid-next weapon hit forces {@dc 19} STR save or restrains target in acid.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: As the ichol.

trait.name: Acidic Weapons
entries: Deals an extra {@damage 3d8} acid damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The uulgol has advantage on saves against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Can't be disarmed of its maul. Gains 5 ({@dice 2d4}) temp HP for each absorbed weapon at start of turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Makes one Claw and one Maul attack, or three Acid Bolt attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@dice 3d8 + 5}) slashing plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@dice 4d6 + 5}) bludgeoning plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) acid damage. If Huge or smaller, {@dc 17} STR save or pushed 10 ft. or knocked {@condition prone} (uulgol's choice). On crit, disadvantage on save and gains {@condition exhaustion} 1.

action.name: Acid Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) acid damage.

bonus.name: Absorb Weapon
entries: Absorbs one weapon within 5 ft. not being its maul. Target must {@dc 17} STR save to resist. Absorbed weapon dissolves in 1 hour if nonmagical. Can retrieve with {@dc 17} STR check.

trait.name: Acidic Weapons
entries: Deals an extra {@damage 2d8} acid damage.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If subjected to a DEX save for half damage, takes none on success and half on failure.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Advantage on saves against spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Makes one Dagger and one Wing Slap attack, or three Acid Bolt attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@dice 1d4 + 5}) piercing plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Wing Slap
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@dice 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage. Target must {@dc 16} CON save or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage each turn until healed.

action.name: Acid Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) acid damage.

bonus.name: Hidden Step
entries: Teleports up to 30 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see and takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The cockatrice is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

action.name: Serrated Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage. Target must succeed on a {@dc 11} CON save or be {@condition restrained} as it begins to turn to stone. Repeats save at end of next turn, {@condition petrified} for 24 hours on failure.

reaction.name: Shrieking Crow
entries: When a creature the cockatrice can see within 30 ft. attacks it, the cockatrice can force a {@dc 11} WIS save or attacker has disadvantage on attack roll.

trait.name: Aberrant Resilience
entries: Resistant to {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, and {@condition stunned}; advantage on saves against effects that alter its form.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While attached to creature, takes half damage (rounded down); other half to creature.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: When motionless without underside exposed, indistinguishable from dark leather cloak.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: Disadvantage on attack rolls and {@skill Perception} checks relying on sight in bright light.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Makes one Bite and two Tail attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If Large or smaller and cloaker has advantage, attaches and blinds target; can't Bite again while attached, but deals 18 ({@dice 4d6 + 4}) piercing at start of each turn. {@dc 15} STR check to detach.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Moan {@recharge}
entries: Each creature within 30 ft. that can hear must {@dc 15} WIS save. Fail: 40 ({@damage 9d8}) psychic damage and {@condition frightened} until end of next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} half damage, not {@condition frightened}.

bonus.name: Cloak of Shadows (3/Day)
entries: Gains Stealth 20 and creatures have disadvantage on attacks against it for 1 minute, ends early if hit.

monster.name: Chuul
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

trait.name: Aberrant Resilience
entries: Resistant to {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, and {@condition stunned}; advantage on saves against effects that alter its form.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sense Magic
entries: Detects location of magic within 120 ft. and sees aura around creature or object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Makes two Pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@dice 3d8 + 4}) bludgeoning. If Large or smaller, {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Two pincers can grapple only one target.

action.name: Wild Reach {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 15 ft. must {@dc 14} DEX save. Fail: 21 ({@dice 6d6}) force, necrotic if no magic item within range. {@actSaveSuccess} half damage. If necrotic, chuul takes half damage if succeeded.

bonus.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
entries: {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature must {@dc 14} CON save or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute, {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned}. Repeat save at end of each turn to end effect.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: Can't use keensense while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: Motionless, looks like stalactite/stalagmite.

trait.name: Jagged Hide
entries: A creature that hits it with melee attack within 5 ft. takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: Resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and {@condition frightened} condition.

action.name: Crush
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning, attaches. If Medium or smaller and has advantage, attaches to head, blinds and suffocates. While attached, can't Crush others, deals 6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning at start of turns. {@dc 13} STR check to detach.

action.name: Topple
entries: While attached, target must {@dc 13} DEX save or be knocked {@condition prone}. If {@condition prone} already, {@condition restrained}.

bonus.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
entries: 15-foot radius darkness aura, moves with it, lasts up to 10 min. Overlaps with 2nd-level or lower light dispels light.

monster.name: Crimson Jelly
senses: keensense 10 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: Can move through 1-inch wide space.

trait.name: Blood Sense
entries: Pinpoint creatures without full HP within 60 ft.

trait.name: Ooze Nature
entries: Doesn't require sleep.

trait.name: Ooze Resilience
entries: Resistant to {@condition restrained}; immune to {@condition exhaustion} and listed conditions.

trait.name: Tainted Attacks
entries: Reduces target to 0 HP: {@dc 9} CHA save or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion} and lose basic self-memory temporarily.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: {@condition Invisible|XPHB} in dim or bright light, faint crimson glow in darkness.

action.name: Feeding Paddles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage. Gains temp HP equal to damage and attaches. While attached, only uses Feeding Paddles. {@dc 12} STR to detach.

bonus.name: Reproduce (Requires Temporary HP)
entries: If has temp HP, splits into clone with equal HP, loses its temp HP. {@spell Clone|PHB} can't gain temp HP from Feeding Paddles until long rest.

trait.name: Celestial Resilience
entries: Resistant to radiant and nonmagical damage.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: Immune to divination that reads thoughts or reveals location, WIS ({@skill Insight}) has disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Advantage on saves vs spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Makes one Bite and one Constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d6 + 5}) piercing plus 14 ({@dice 4d6}) poison. If reduced to 0 HP by poison, can choose target to be stable but {@condition unconscious} for 1 hour.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@dice 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning, {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}), {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Healing Hiss (3/Day)
entries: Regain 10 ({@dice 3d6}) HP and cure disease or poison.

bonus.name: Change Shape
entries: Transforms into Large or smaller Beast or Humanoid CR ≤ own CR or back to true form, retains features, proficiencies, and HP.

reaction.name: Rainbow Shield
entries: Imposes rainbow shield between self and attacker within 30 ft., disadvantage on attack roll or auto-miss if attacker didn't attack another creature last minute.

trait.name: Fey Resilience
entries: The deathless is resistant to the {@condition charmed} and {@condition unconscious} conditions.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The deathless regains 10 HP at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP and at least 1 of its nesting dolls is intact.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathless makes three Death Blow or Death Bolt attacks.

action.name: Death Blow
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} CON save or its HP maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its HP maximum to 0.

action.name: Death Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 5d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Call of Death
entries: One creature that doesn't have all its HP and that the deathless can see within 30 feet must make a {@dc 16} CON save, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Disgraced Rejuvenation
entries: Unless redeemed, a destroyed death knight returns in {@dice 1d4} days, regaining all its HP and becoming active again within 10 feet of where it died.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The death knight has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The death knight doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Undead Resilience
entries: The death knight is immune to poison damage, {@condition exhaustion}, and the {@condition poisoned} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death knight makes three Greatsword or Necrotic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Champion's Challenge
entries: The death knight challenges one creature it can see within 30 ft. It must succeed on a {@dc 15} CHA save or have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the knight until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The death knight adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack it can see.

reaction.name: Soul Drain
entries: When the death knight reduces a Humanoid to 0 HP, it can absorb the creature's soul. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} WIS save or immediately die, its soul becoming trapped in the knight's sword. The death knight has advantage on attack rolls for 1 minute after absorbing a soul. The creature can't be restored to life until the death knight is permanently destroyed.

trait.name: Monstrosity Resilience
entries: The death dog is resistant to {@condition exhaustion} and to the {@condition frightened} condition.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The death dog has two heads and is resistant to the {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and {@condition unconscious} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death dog makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} CON save or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target is {@condition poisoned}. Every 24 hours that elapse, the infected creature must repeat the save, reducing its HP maximum by 5 ({@dice 2d4}) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest after the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its HP maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Dual Bark
entries: The death dog's two heads bark at creatures in two 15-foot cones. Each creature in the area of a cone must succeed on a {@dc 12} CON save or be {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn. If the cones overlap each other, each creature in overlapping cones must make only one save with disadvantage rather than one save for each cone.

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The glabrezu is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The glabrezu has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Point Blank Grappler
entries: When the glabrezu makes a Crackling Flame Bolt attack, it doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, provided it is grappling that creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes two Claw attacks and two Pincer attacks, or it makes four Crackling Flame Bolt attacks. It can replace both Claw attacks with two Crackling Flame Bolt attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Crackling Flame Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) fire damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Manipulating Whispers
entries: The glabrezu whispers in the mind of a creature it can see within 120 feet of it, encouraging the creature to commit wicked acts. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} CHA save or succumb to one of the following urges: Boastful Stance. The target is overcome with surety of its own battle prowess, momentarily letting down its guard. Creatures have advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of the glabrezu's next turn. Confirmation of Wealth. The target is briefly overcome with the desire to confirm the amount and status of its valuables. It uses either an action or bonus action on its next turn (the glabrezu's choice) to count and take stock of its valuables. Wrathful Strike. Anger fills the target, and it immediately lashes out at those nearby. The target uses its reaction to make one melee weapon attack against a creature of the glabrezu's choice within 5 feet of the target.

trait.name: Abyssal Rejuvenation
entries: Unlike other outsiders, a dretch that dies in its home plane of the Abyss is restored in a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its HP and becoming active again. The new body appears in a random location in the Abyss. Only sprinkling holy water on the dretch's remains can prevent this trait from functioning.

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The dretch is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Fetid Cloud (1/Day)
entries: A 10-foot radius cloud of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The cloud's area is lightly obscured and lasts 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. A creature that starts its turn in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 11} CON save or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a creature can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.

trait.name: Demonic Flames
entries: Creatures resistant to fire damage aren't resistant to fire damage dealt by the balor. Creatures immune to fire damage are still immune to the balor's fire damage.

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The balor is resistant to cold and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Diving Assault
entries: If the balor is flying and moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 20} STR save or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the balor can make one Longsword attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor makes one Gore attack, one Longsword attack, and one Whip attack.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d4 + 8}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 20} STR save or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The husk demon can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The husk demon is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The husk demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The husk demon makes two Life Drain attacks.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the husk demon regains HP equal to half the necrotic damage dealt. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} CON save or its HP maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its HP maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Soul Feed
entries: The husk demon feasts on the light in the soul of up to two creatures it can see within 20 ft. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} CHA save or suffer the chosen effect until the end of its next turn. A creature that fails two rounds in a row suffers one level of {@condition exhaustion}. Happiness Feast: disadvantage on attack rolls. Hope Feast: disadvantage on saves. Motivation Feast: speed is halved.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hezrou can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The hezrou is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The hezrou can communicate with frogs and toads as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Long jump up to 20 ft. and high jump up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 ft. must succeed on a {@dc 16} CON save or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On success, immune for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes one Sticky Tongue attack, one Bite attack, and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sticky Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} STR save or be pulled up to 15 ft. toward the hezrou.

bonus.name: Quick Leap
entries: The hezrou jumps horizontally up to 20 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Golmana
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

trait.name: Demonic Resilience
entries: The golmana is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the {@condition poisoned} condition.

trait.name: Heightened Hearing
entries: {@skill Perception} is 19 when perceiving by hearing.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golmana makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack. If both Claw attacks hit a Medium or smaller creature, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the golmana can't make Claw attacks against other targets.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Void Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: Screech in a 30 ft. cone. Each creature that isn't a Fiend must make a {@dc 15} CON save, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. On failure, also has disadvantage on next attack roll before end of golmana's next turn.

bonus.name: Consuming Rend
entries: If grappling a creature, the target must make a {@dc 15} DEX save, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage on failure, or half on success. The golmana regains HP equal to damage dealt.

sense.name: Keensense
entries: A creature with keensense can precisely perceive its surroundings using some other sense than vision. Creatures without vision, such as morlocks and gelatinous cubes, typically have this special sense, as do creatures with echolocation or other extraordinary sense, such as bats and true dragons.
If a creature has no other form of sensing, it has a parenthetical note to this effect, indicating that the radius of its keensense defines the maximum range of its perception.
